Example: Hi there! How are you today?
How's it going? – Not bad, thanks.

English: A one-way ticket to London, please.
Polish: Poproszę bilet w jedną stronę do Londynu.

English: Can I see your passport, please?
Could you call me a taxi, please?
Polish: Czy mógłby Pan/Pani wezwać mi taksówkę?

English: Where is the nearest bus stop?
Could we see the menu, please?
Can I get some water, please?
Could you bring the bill, please?
Do you have this in a bigger size?
Polish: Czy macie to w większym rozmiarze?

English: Can I have a receipt, please?
Do you have this in another color?
Polish: Czy macie to w innym kolorze?
